content: I’m with Flake ,63 percent of white voters voted for Trump and he gave every indication during his campaign he’s not to be trusted. But 63% of the white voter still trusted him. Now you want to growl and moan cause your politician still can’t under any circustance be trusted. You been a fool from the very beginning. Go ahead. Read your history and learn how the “jeffersonians and Jacksonsonians trick the white voter, then, just like now. Scruff what we learned on TV concerning the Mafia or blacks or for that matter any other ethnic group when it comes to underhandeness and crime because none of them matches who hasn’t been given a name. Go ahead watch Fox news and how proud they are of their elected crime boss. The one who does’nt mean what he says and gets away with it.
